dsOverview.title: W.M.O. Station (Surface and Upper Air) Library (November 1995)

summary.p: This dataset contains a station library for WMO surface and upper-air stations. The library is current as of November 1995.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UN/WMO > World Meteorological Organization, United Nations

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Station Height
